pageContext.claim: “And, as far as Muslims are concerned, as he told me, I guess they have 200 Mus- -- 200 million Muslims in India. And a fairly short while ago, they had 14 million. And he said that they're working very closely with the Muslim community.”
pageContext.analysis: Muslims are a minority in India — roughly 200 million of the total 1.3 billion people. Roughly 35 million Muslims stayed in India after partition, which created Pakistan and Bangladesh (then called East Pakistan), so it’s not clear what Trump’s talking about when he says “very recently.” Moreover, Modi has long had a tense relationship with India’s Muslim community. He joined a Hindu nationalist group as a young man and has been charged with turning a blind eye to riots that killed more than a thousand people — mostly Muslim — as Chief Minister of the Gujarati government in 2002.
